articles.title: Fresh romantic track, genuine humour make Naslen-starrer 'Premalu' a fun watch | Onmanorama - Onmanorama
articles.description: If 'Thaneermathan Dhinangal' was set in a school and told the emotions of a teenager, 'Premalu' is about a fresh-out-of-college youngster who tries to find a footing professionally, while hopelessly falling in love.
